teaching business':'Track your learning progress and connect with teachers'})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center space-x-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"p-2 transition-colors",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Settings,{className:"w-6 h-6"})})]})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mb-8",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"flex capitalize ${activeTab===tab?'border-primary-500 text-primary-600':'border-transparent text-gray-500 hover:text-gray-700 hover:border-gray-300'}`,children:tab},tab)):['overview','lessons','messages','analytics'].map(tab=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setActiveTab(tab),className:`py-2 px-1 border-b-2 sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; import { useChat } from '../contexts/ChatContext'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Users, MessageCircle, Calendar, Star, TrendingUp, BookOpen, Settings, Bell, Search, ArrowRight, Clock, DollarSign, Award, Eye, Heart, UserPlus, Shield, Database } from 'lucide-react'; const DashboardPage = () => { const { currentUser } = useAuth(); const { conversations, unreadCount } = useChat(); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('overview'); const isTeacher = currentUser?.role === 'teacher'; const isAdmin = currentUser?.role === 'admin'; // Mock data for dashboard const stats = { totalStudents: 45, totalEarnings: 2840, totalHours: 127, averageRating: 4.8, upcomingLessons: 3, unreadMessages: unreadCount }; // Mock admin data const adminStats = { totalUsers: 1250, totalTeachers: 89, totalStudents: 1161, activeUsers: 342, newRegistrations: 23 }; const recentUsers = [ { id: 1, name: 'ნინო ბერიძე', email: 'nino@example.com', role: 'teacher', status: 'active', joined: '2 hours ago' }, { id: 2, name: 'გიორგი მაისურაძე', email: 'giorgi@example.com', role: 'teacher', status: 'pending', joined: '4 hours ago' }, { id: 3, name: 'ელენა როდრიგესი', email: 'elena@example.com', role: 'student', status: 'active', joined: '1 day ago' }, { id: 4, name: 'დავით კიმი', email: 'david@example.com', role: 'teacher', status: 'active', joined: '2 days ago' } ]; const recentActivity = [ { id: 1, type: 'lesson', title: 'Math tutoring session with Alex', time: '2 hours ago', status: 'completed' }, { id: 2, type: 'message', title: 'New message from Sarah', time: '4 hours ago', status: 'unread' }, { id: 3, type: 'booking', title: 'New lesson booking from Mike', time: '1 day ago', status: 'pending' } ]; const upcomingLessons = [ { id: 1, student: 'Emma Wilson', subject: 'Calculus', time: 'Tomorrow, 2:00 PM', duration: '1 hour' }, { id: 2, student: 'John Davis', subject: 'Physics', time: 'Wednesday, 4:00 PM', duration: '1.5 hours' } ]; const renderAdminDashboard = () => (
{/* Admin Stats Cards */}

Total Users

{adminStats.totalUsers}

Teachers

{adminStats.totalTeachers}

Students

{adminStats.totalStudents}

Active Users

{adminStats.activeUsers}

New Today

{adminStats.newRegistrations}

{/* Database Management */}

Database Management

{/* Recent Users */}

Recent Registrations

{recentUsers.map(user => (

{user.name}

{user.email}

{user.role} {user.status} {user.joined}
))}
); const renderTeacherDashboard = () => (
{/* Stats Cards */}

Total Students

{stats.totalStudents}

Total Earnings

${stats.totalEarnings}

Teaching Hours

{stats.totalHours}h

Average Rating

{stats.averageRating}

{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

View Messages

{stats.unreadMessages} unread

ჩემი პროფილი

Edit your information and CV

{/* Upcoming Lessons */}

Upcoming Lessons

View all
{upcomingLessons.map(lesson => (

{lesson.student}

{lesson.subject}

{lesson.time}

{lesson.duration}

))}
{/* Recent Activity */}

Recent Activity

{recentActivity.map(activity => (
{activity.type === 'lesson' && } {activity.type === 'message' && } {activity.type === 'booking' && }

{activity.title}

{activity.time}

{activity.status}
))}
); const renderStudentDashboard = () => (
{/* Stats Cards */}

Active Teachers

8

Total Lessons

24

Upcoming

3

Unread Messages

{stats.unreadMessages}

{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

Find Teachers

Browse available tutors

Messages

{stats.unreadMessages} unread

{/* Recent Teachers */}

Recent Teachers

View all
{[1, 2, 3, 4].map(i => (

Dr. Sarah Johnson

Mathematics

4.9
))}
); return (
{/* Header */}

Welcome back, {currentUser?.name}!

{isAdmin ? 'Admin Dashboard - Manage platform and users' : isTeacher ? 'Here\'s what\'s happening with your teaching business' : 'Track your learning progress and connect with teachers'}

{/* Tabs */}
{isAdmin ? ['overview', 'users', 'teachers', 'analytics'].map(tab => ( )) : ['overview', 'lessons', 'messages', 'analytics'].map(tab => ( )) }
{/* Dashboard Content */}
{activeTab === 'overview' && ( isAdmin ? renderAdminDashboard() : isTeacher ? renderTeacherDashboard() : renderStudentDashboard() )} {activeTab === 'lessons' && (

Lessons

Lesson management features coming soon...

)} {activeTab === 'messages' && (

Messages

Go to Messages
)} {activeTab === 'analytics' && (

Analytics

Analytics dashboard coming soon...

)} {isAdmin && activeTab === 'users' && (

User Management

User management features coming soon...

)} {isAdmin && activeTab === 'teachers' && (

Teacher Management

Teacher verification and management features coming soon...

)}
); }; export default DashboardPage;
